name: MultiMC
description:
MultiMC is a free, open source launcher for Minecraft, managed by @peterixxx and @02JanDal. It allows you to have multiple, separate instances of Minecraft (each with their own mods, texture packs, saves, etc) and helps you manage them and their associated options with a simple interface.

https://multimc.org/

execute.command: wget https://files.multimc.org/downloads/multimc_1.4-1.deb | sudo chmod 777 multimc_1.4-1.deb | sudo dpkg -i multimc_1.4-1.deb

content:
exe: MultiMC
installer:
- execute:
    command: wget https://files.multimc.org/downloads/multimc_1.4-1.deb | sudo chmod
      777 multimc_1.4-1.deb | sudo dpkg -i multimc_1.4-1.deb
